summary:
Josefine is a Nord based healer follower with emphasis on magic & secondary archery. She is available in Custom UUNP, Base UNP, and Base CBBE. HDT Armor & No Armor Versions.

*Think Jilted Bride as she is based on a real life person.*
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana]﻿[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/ud8qh1xqv/Nickyxylr5edit.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]﻿
Name:  Josefine
Race:  Custom Nord
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriage:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  60
Body:  Custom UUNP, UNP, CBBE
Skin:  Fair Skin Optimized or Leyenda Skin Update
Weapons:  Custom & Base Spells; Bow/Arrows (Elven Temper Class Upgrade-able)
Armor:  Solace Robes
Location:  Temple of Mara, Riften

Levels with Player
Spells:  Custom & Vanilla Healing & Attack

Tested with EFF, AFT, FLP
ENBs in Screenshots:  Caffeine, Snapdragon, Rudy, Antique Dragon
Custom FeverNB, Custom Konan, Elder Blood Redux, Grim & Somber, RealVision (Used by Testers & Screen Archers)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6z0r54njb/Nightingale0023_1.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]﻿
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

HDT Physics (Armor Versions)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]﻿

[youtube]F7Icc-8Uang[/youtube]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]﻿
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head (Some users have said [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512]Leyenda[/url]﻿ Skin helped to reduce this issue)

Common HDT Issues of stretching & invisibility (Please Google to find a fix that may work for you)

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]﻿[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]﻿﻿ (Screen Archer & Tester)(ENB:  RealVision)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5973055/?]dragonstar99[/url]﻿﻿ (Tester)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/13593925]zhoulia[/url]﻿ (Screen Archer & Tester)(ENB:  Custom Konan)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/21147009]NICKYXYLR[/url]﻿ (Screen Archer & Tester)(ENB:  Custom FeverNB)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/43861107]NIGHTINGALE0023[/url]﻿ (Screen Archer & Tester)(ENB:  Elder Blood Redux; Grim & Somber)

[i]**Screen Archer's images are labeled with their Nexus ID in Images Section**[/i]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5jz6gdjvb/Nickyxylr1editcrop.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q_A.png[/img]﻿
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  I have no immediate plans to do so

Q:  What armor is she wearing in *screenshot*
A:  KuNn Outfit, Winter Snow Dress, Haku Wedding Dress
are featured in several screenshots.
A:  HN66s Hands and Nails

Q:  Why isn't she using her bow?
A:  She won't use it unless she runs out of magic in most situations.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  I have no intentions on doing individual requests.
A:  This follower is very personal to me so I have no plans on changing anything.

Q:  She is stretching....Invisible
A:  Please google HDT fixes that may work on your system.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
